sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM SYSM0500 WHERE USR_ID = #usrId# AND AUTH_GRP_SEIL_NUM = #authGrpSeilNum# AND SYS_DIV_CD = #sysDivCd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SYSM0500 ( USR_ID , AUTH_GRP_SEIL_NUM , SYS_DIV_CD , USR_AUTH_USE_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , INPT_ADDR ) VALUES ( #usrId# , #authGrpSeilNum# , #sysDivCd# , #usrAuthUseYn# , #kybdr# , SYSDATE , #ismt# , SYSDATE , #revnAddr# , #inptAddr# )
